title: AI-Based Chatbot for College Enquiry
description: Developed a chatbot to handle common student queries related to admissions, course offerings, and campus facilities.
outcome: Successfully automated over 75% of FAQ responses; reduced workload on college admin desk.

title: Online Voting System using Blockchain
description: Built a secure and transparent online voting platform based on blockchain technology to ensure vote integrity.
outcome: Demonstrated tamper-proof transactions; received appreciation during university tech fair.

title: Virtual Lab for Physics Experiments
description: Created a web-based 3D interactive physics lab for students to simulate and visualize experiments remotely.
outcome: Used by over 200 students; improved conceptual understanding and accessibility.

title: Smart Waste Management System
description: Designed a prototype system for real-time waste bin monitoring and alerting the municipality for pickups.
outcome: Tested in a campus block; optimized waste collection frequency by 40%.
